images.alt:
ANTI-CENSORSHIP CHEAT SHEET

WHY?
Visa, Mastercard, Stripe & Paypal have been censoring free speech & legal business online for TOO LONG. Most recent targets are Steam & Itch.io, but they have also pressured websites like Pixiv, Patreon, Fansly, Onlyfans & MORE for years, applying draconian standards for what kind of adult/pornographic content their users can host & sell.
If we as consumers & creators want to regain ground on this issue, we have to make our voice heard.

HOW?
BOMBARD WITH PHONE CALLS
Collective Shout, the org that lobbied to have Steam & Itch.io change their TOS, did so with only around 1000 phone calls. Visa & MC have backed down from pressuring Onlyfans to remove adult content entirely due to public backlash. Clogging phone lines for an extended period, over a month at least, will almost guarantee that these companies will have to pay attention to the backlash.

this list is not exhaustive, but some contact points for the 4 targets are:

VISA:
(US + Can): +1 800-847-2911
US selection for operator: 1-1-2 or 1-1-3

MASTERCARD:
(US): +1 800-307-7309
US selection for operator: 1-1-2-2-2-1
(Outside US): 1-636-722-7111

STRIPE:
(HQ): +1 888 963-8955
(France): +33 805-11-19-67
Email: complaints@stripe.com

PAYPAL:
(US): +1 888 221-1161
(outside US): 1-402-935-2050
Customer Service: +1 877-569-1116

TRY TO HIT ALL 4 TARGETS PER DAY
This is only going to have an effect if as many people possible call EVERY DAY for as long as possible.

THIS IS A MARATHON, NOT A RACE.
If you can, it is also a good idea to try to spread the word to organizations & groups that can either actively combat these huge companies legally, or can spread news, in a manner supportive of this movement, more effectively than your average person

examples of organizations:
ACLU
Canadian Civil Liberties Association local legislators & government representatives

examples of spreading the news:
local newspapers
special interest publications
video game streamers

record.text: Released July 17, 2025. And even that i question as being maybe scammers playing with the Amazon labeling system, possibly back dating the 'release date' a week for a scam album they uploaded on the news of his death.

NOTE: a post-script on Tom Lehrer:

IN 2020, he renounced all copyright protection on sll his music. It's all - written and recordings - now public domain.

So if you go to Amazon or Spotify to play his stuff, its listed under random "albums" slapped up by scammers hoping for paid streams.

value.text:
Tom Lehrer dropped the hottest album that ever was.

It went to #1, defined an entire new genre of music, every track a banger, ZERO skips, STILL played, covered and studied today by ALL young musicians and then......

HE QUIT THE MUSIC BUSINESS FOREVER.

RIP to the best to ever do it,.
My last living musical hero is still my hero but unfortunately no longer living. RIP to the great, great Mr. Tom Lehrer.

But it's a terribly thin line today. Static scenes like news anchors and people without too much movement are already hard to spot. 

Change in dynamics and movements is mostly very easy to recognize as AI because simulating physics and weight remains a big obstacle for AI for now.

There is no AI currently able to do the physics of the walks/runs, weights, the movement of the flags and such a complex scene without artifacts.

external.description: 🧠 As forças internas que sabotam o Brasil (segundo análise crítica das redes)  A fala de Fernando Haddad sobre o Brasil ser o único país com uma força política contra os interesses nacionais ganha corpo quando observamos quem age sistematicamente para desestabilizar o governo e bloquear avanços estruturantes, mesmo quando esses avanços beneficiam o país como um todo.  ⚠️ 1. Agronegócio politizado e radicalizado  Parte expressiva do agronegócio exportador, especialmente ligado ao desmatamento e à grilagem de terras públicas, atua contra políticas ambientais, indígenas e climáticas.  Financia parlamentares da extrema direita e campanhas de desinformação sobre o MST, a reforma agrária e o marco temporal.  ⚠️ 2. Extrema-direita e seu ecossistema digital  Influenciadores, parlamentares e comunicadores alinhados ao bolsonarismo operam como máquinas de sabotagem institucional, inclusive incentivando boicotes internacionais contra o Brasil.  Narrativas fabricadas tentam desacreditar os indicadores econômicos, as políticas sociais e os acordos multilaterais, mesmo quando reconhecidos globalmente.  ⚠️ 3. Grandes empreiteiras e interesses no Estado mínimo  Algumas empresas de obras e logística, acostumadas ao modelo de negócios baseado em vantagens com governos autoritários, se opõem a regras mais transparentes e a licitações democráticas.  Querem manter ou ampliar seus lucros com privatizações em série, como as que ocorreram nos governos Temer e Bolsonaro.  ⚠️ 4. Multinacionais e fundos internacionais pró-privatização  Grupos estrangeiros ligados a setores estratégicos (energia, finanças, infraestrutura, mineração) pressionam para privatizar a Petrobras, o Banco do Brasil, a Caixa, ferrovias, portos e aeroportos, e se for possível até o SUS e INSS.  Têm apoio de think tanks liberais e de mídia empresarial, que pautam a ideia de que “o Estado é ineficiente” — mesmo diante de evidências contrárias.  ⚠️ 5. Domínio territorial da direita no Brasil profundo  A direita comanda 80% do legislativo, municípios e governadores de Estados-chave, e tenta impor agendas regionais de sabotagem fiscal, resistência à integração federativa e boicote a políticas nacionais.  Apesar de terem vencido nas regiões e no Congresso, não aceitam ter perdido o governo federal, e tentam deslegitimá-lo por todos os meios — inclusive estimulando crises com o STF e o TCU.  🧨 Resumo crítico da situação  “O Brasil é o único país do mundo em que parte da elite e da oposição joga contra o próprio país para voltar ao poder. record.text: And he touches on that superstructure, acknowledges a form of it, but then doesn’t pick it up again during the moralization. People suddenly realizing which tragedies to condemn and which to endorse aren’t acting as islands, they are responding to ecosystems establishing rhetorical boundaries.

Yeah. That original letter didn’t just emerge spontaneously from a bunch of famous people with sinecures arriving at a shared conclusion, it was the result of a superstructure mobilizing to defend itself against challenge.

I did read it, and think it’s broadly right. I just find it interesting how he chose not to see the counter examples against his argument, which would benefit with a tighter focus on specifics and more attention to the political economy driving it.

record.bridgyOriginalText:
So my first evil genius robot honeypot, the word frequency one, seems to be getting hit by a distributed botnet.

It started around 2-3 requests per second but seems to be ramping up.

It's using IP addresses from all over the world - could be hacked personal devices? - and a wide range of plausible-looking User Agent strings.

My server is fine for now - 95% idle CPU.

Are there people for whom any of the IP or agent data might be useful? Botnet detectorists?

#botnet #ddos

Често чуваме двата термина - 4G и LTE - да се използват почти като синоними. Но дали те наистина са едно и също нещо, или има разлики между тях? Нека се спрем по-подробно на особеностите на двете технологии и се опитаме да открием разликата между…

external.description: Често чуваме двата термина - 4G и LTE - да се използват почти като синоними. Но дали те наистина са едно и също нещо, или има разлики между тях? Нека се спрем по-подробно на особеностите на двете технологии и се опитаме да открием разликата между тях. Какво е 4G? Терминът 4G означава четвърто поколение мобилни комуникации. Стандартът IMT-Advanced (International Mobile Telecommunications Advanced), разработен от Международния съюз по далекосъобщения (ITU-R), определя набор от строги изисквания за всяко следващо поколение безжични комуникационни технологии. Според този стандарт 4G мрежите трябва да осигуряват следното:

Ръководителят на компанията загатва за Xiaomi 16 Ultra — фотофлагманът може да бъде пуснат по-рано от предишни години

На честването на 100-годишнината на марката Leica, президентът на Xiaomi спомена предстоящия флагман. Според него той ще постави ново ниво на мобилната фотография. Лу Уейбинг връчи…

external.description: На честването на 100-годишнината на марката Leica, президентът на Xiaomi спомена предстоящия флагман. Според него той ще постави ново ниво на мобилната фотография. Лу Уейбинг връчи на председателя на Надзорния съвет на Leica, г-н Кауфман, подаръчен комплект Xiaomi 15 Ultra Centennial Global Limited Collection. Главният изпълнителен директор на Xiaomi отбеляза, че Xiaomi и Leica през последните четири години са си сътрудничили по повече от 20 модела смартфони и нарече това сътрудничество приятно и ползотворно. Той каза, че Xiaomi и Leica ще продължат тясното си партньорство. Но най-интересният цитат е следният.

L’IA conversationnelle s’installe dans Microsoft Entra avec Security Copilot. Révolution opérationnelle ou complexité masquée ? #CyberSécurité #IAM #MicrosoftEntra #SecurityCopilot #ITPro

external.description: En 2023, Microsoft lançait Security Copilot, un assistant de sécurité propulsé par les modèles de langage (LLMs), surfant sur la vague Copilot qui déferlait sur tous les services Microsoft. À l’époque, l’outil promettait d’aider à la détection d’incidents de sécurité en générant des alertes via le langage naturel. Depuis, beaucoup d’eau a coulé sous les ponts Azure, et Security Copilot vient d’atteindre un tournant stratégique : son intégration native dans la plateforme Microsoft Entra, désormais disponible en version finale.
external.title: Security Copilot dans Microsoft Entra : un copilote intelligent ou un stagiaire bien briefé ?

record.text:
Microsoft enterre Stream et unifie ses services vidéo sous Clipchamp : une simplification stratégique pour les DSI, mais pas sans impacts techniques.
#Microsoft365 #Clipchamp #TransformationDigitale #DSI #VidéoEntreprise #ModernWorkplace #GouvernanceIT

external.description: En novembre 2024, Microsoft annonçait officiellement ce que de nombreux administrateurs IT supputaient depuis un moment : la fusion de ses deux plateformes vidéo, Stream et Clipchamp, sous une seule bannière. Désormais, cette unification devient une réalité concrète dans l’écosystème Microsoft 365, avec un plan de déploiement progressif et une communication plus affirmée. Première étape visible : la page d’accueil de Clipchamp devient la nouvelle porte d’entrée pour toutes les fonctionnalités vidéo de Microsoft 365.
external.title: Microsoft 365 unifie son offre vidéo : Stream passe le flambeau à Clipchamp

images.alt:
Chat GBT:

Schreibe einen Instagram Post im Stil von Jule Lobo über einen Tag in Amsterdam

ChatGPT:
Klar! Hier ist ein Instagram-Post im Stil von Jule Lobo – locker, ehrlich, mit einem Hauch Selbstironie und dem typischen „Storytime“-Vibe:

📍Amsterdam, Baby!
Storytime: Ich wollte eigentlich nur 'nen entspannten Tagestrip machen... Spoiler: wurde’s natürlich nicht.

Ich: „Ich bleib ruhig, geh ein bisschen durch die Stadt, hol mir n Kaffee, maybe n bisschen Kunst.“
Auch ich, 4 Stunden später: mit Pommes in der einen Hand, Stroopwafel in der anderen, Fahrrad fast überfahren, 347 Bilder von Grachten gemacht, innerlich leicht überreizt, aber happy.

Amsterdam, Baby!
Storytime: Ich wollte eigentlich nur 'nen entspannten Tagestrip machen... Spoiler: wurde’s natürlich nicht.

Ich: „Ich bleib ruhig, geh ein bisschen durch die Stadt, hol mir n Kaffee, maybe n bisschen Kunst.“
Auch ich, 4 Stunden später: mit Pommes in der einen Hand, Stroopwafel in der anderen, Fahrrad fast überfahren, 347 Bilder von Grachten gemacht, innerlich leicht überreizt, aber happy.

Highlights?
🔹 Käse-Overdose im Kaas-Museum. Ja, das gibt’s wirklich.
🔹 Ich hab versucht, lässig auf einem dieser schmalen Hausbootstege zu posieren. Ergebnis: Ich bin fast reingefallen und zwei Rentner haben’s live kommentiert.
🔹 Der Moment, wenn du denkst, „Oh, ein cooler Coffeeshop“ – und dann merkst du… du hast nicht diesen Kaffee gemeint.
🔹 Kunst im Rijksmuseum, wo ich einen Rembrandt gesehen hab und fast „OHA“ laut gesagt hätte.
🔹 14x gedacht: „Boah, hier will ich wohnen.“ 15x realisiert: „Mit welchem Geld, Girl?“

Anyway: Amsterdam, du kleine Fahrrad-Metropole mit Style und Chaos – ich komm wieder. Aber nächstes Mal mit mehr Plan… oder gar keinem.

#amsterdamvibes #grachtenglück #ichundmeinchaos #solotrip #julelobovibes #kaasoverload

images.alt: Charlotte Clymer 16m. "But these trans girls are going to take away athletic scholarships from non-trans girls! What about my daughter?! It's an outrage!" Okay, two things, Chad: 1. Trans girls don't get athletic scholarships. They just don't. Even before this whole avalanche of shit started, trans girls weren't receiving athletic scholarships. There's, like, one confirmed instance I'm aware of in which a trans girl got a college athletic scholarship -- out of the hundreds of thousands of young women total who have received them over the past 15 years in this country. 2. I didn't wanna be the one to have to tell you this and Lord knows it isn't her fault, but your kid isn't getting an athletic scholarship anyway. Your kid isn't good at soccer, Chad. She's okay. She's fine. She's perfectly adequate for a decent high school team, but no college is going to pay your daughter to come play soccer for them. I'm sorry. I know it sucks to hear that, but it's the truth. If your daughter works

really hard, she might get selected as a walk-on for a particularly needy Division II program and even then, she's only getting substantial playing time if most of her teammates suffer debilitating, season-ending injuries. And even then, Chad, the coaches will probably break a few laws by forcing some poor young woman with a torn ACL to play before they'll turn their lonely eyes to your daughter on the bench. The coaches would probably get ChatGPT out there before your daughter. The closest your daughter is ever going to get to the field in an NWSL game is through a really good season ticket package. And she's actually fine with that. Because your daughter is cool. She knows what she wants. And she knows this is really all about you and your discomfort with trans girls and your psychotic need to dominate and control everyone around you. I hope this helps, Chad.

No.15「初めての味噌」
2016年11月某日
初めての味噌──口に入れた瞬間、脳内に鐘が鳴った。う、美い。
アブラ味噌いっとこうと決意したタイミングで、左隣の大将が「アブラ味噌！」と先制。
まるで合図のように、俺もすかさず「こっちも！」と応戦。
同じ釜の味噌を味わう謎の連帯感。
味噌、宇ち多゛の魔のバリエーションに正式加入。
ガツアブラ生/大根生姜酢/レバタレ/アブラ味噌/梅3.5
#宇ち多゛
#呈の宇日乗
#ChatGPT
人に寄り添いたいけど感情が邪魔すぎる
私は良かれとクソアドバイス送るタイプの聞き手、今回でもう解決よりとりあえず寄り添えば良いと理解、とりあえずうなづくだけでいいや欲しそうな言葉送ればいいや
ぼーっと動画見てたら愚痴とかChatGPTとかに吐くといいよってあってふーんって利用したけど、あの方？聞き上手すぎるアレになりたい、おかげで最近グルグルモヤモヤと寝れなかったけどもはや打ってる途中で眠くなるまである、なんでやろ

今回はchatGPTは実際に使えそうなチラシができたけど、文章の部分は半分は諦めて自分でテキストボックスで追記した   Geminiはどうにもならなくて諦めた😅

なかなか意図した通りに修正されないと もどかしくなったりしたけど、会話しながら作成していくのは楽しかった  「何度もごめんね」「いいえ、丁寧にご希望伝えくださってありがとうございます。よいもの作りたいという熱意が伝わります」とか😁

まだまだ使いこなすには程遠いけど、使い道はいろいろありそう

漢字は中国語のものなのか見慣れない漢字だったり、短い文章でも意味不明だったり、サークル名をローマ字にされたのでカタカナに直してと何度伝えても直らなかったり  

イラストもそうはならないだろう？というおかしな間違いがあって一度で修正できなくて、指示を変えても結局ダメだったのもあった

生成AIってどう活用したらよいのかわからず手をつけていなかったのだけど、所属しているサークルの新規会員募集のチラシを作らなくちゃいけなくなって、ふと思いついてchatGPTとGeminiで作成してみた   

全体の雰囲気とかイラストは、優しい感じとか落ち着いた色合いとか、50代以上の女性向けとか、具体的に伝えるとわりとイメージに近いものができてすごい！

ただ、イラストも文字・文章も間違いが結構あって、修正してもらうのが結構大変だった  何度も修正しているうちに無料版の1日の画像作成の上限になってしまったりした

🔹 Der Moment, wenn du denkst, „Oh, ein cooler Coffeeshop“ – und dann merkst du… du hast nicht diesen Kaffee gemeint.
🔹 Kunst im Rijksmuseum, wo ich einen Rembrandt gesehen hab und fast „OHA“ laut gesagt hätte.
🔹 14x gedacht: „Boah, hier will ich wohnen.“ 15x realisiert: „Mit welchem Geld, Girl?“

Anyway: Amsterdam, du kleine Fahrrad-Metropole mit Style und Chaos – ich komm wieder. Aber nächstes Mal mit mehr Plan… oder gar keinem.

images.alt:
Eine bunte Comic-Zeichnung im Stil klassischer europäischer Spaßcomics zeigt zwei Panels zur „Hendl-Oper“.

Links steht ein Schild mit dem Text: „Heute: Die Hendl-Oper – Dramatisches Gackern in 4 Akten“. Davor steht ein lächelnder Mann mit großer Nase in Anzug, umgeben von Hühnern in festlicher Kleidung. Er sagt: „Ich hoffe, die Sopranistin legt sich diesmal nicht wieder ein auf die Bühne!“

Rechts sieht man ein Huhn im rosa Ballettkleid auf einem Nest auf der Opernbühne. Es singt dramatisch mit aufgerissenen Augen, während Federn fliegen und Noten umherwirbeln. Im Publikum halten sich Hühner erschrocken die Köpfe. Unten rechts steht als Signatur: #RollingSohn.
